sentences.en: ...broad straw hats decorated with ostrich plumes.
A plume of smoke rose from the chimney.
sentences.cn: 从烟囱里冒出一缕轻烟.

sentences.en: From his bare head his long hair streamed upward, waving a plume.
sentences.cn: 从他已秃顶的头上飘起几缕长发, 象羽毛般在空中摆动.

sentences.en: Hair coarse, straight and full, with no appearance of a plume.
sentences.cn: 尾巴的毛发粗壮 、 直而浓密, 看起来不想羽毛.

sentences.en: Out in Epworth, there is a plume of smoke from burning tyres.
sentences.cn: 在爱华市的街道上, 一股黑烟从燃烧的轮胎上冉冉升起.

sentences.en: Red carneol and barite etc. have the features of plume rocks.
sentences.cn: 红碧玉、重晶石等具有喷流岩的特征.

sentences.en: S - type granites should not be considered as the evidence of plume magmatism.
sentences.cn: 不能把S - 型花岗岩作为地幔柱岩浆作用的证据.

sentences.en: She writes under the nom de plume of Alison Cooper.
sentences.cn: 她用笔名艾莉森·库珀写作。

sentences.en: The ash plume across 6 provinces, raising fears of damage to crops.
sentences.cn: 火山灰笼罩了危地马拉6个省份, 农作物生长或受影响.

sentences.en: The birth of universe perhaps was just a mysterious plume of smoke.
sentences.cn: 洪荒初开或许只是一阵神秘的烟气.

sentences.en: The inferno spewed a deadly plume of radioactive isotopes into the atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 这个象炼狱般的地方将一缕致死的放射性同位素喷入大气层.

sentences.en: The plume is a kind of widespread physical phenomena.
sentences.cn: 摘要浮力射流现象(又称羽流),是自然界很普遍的一种物理现象.

sentences.en: The rising plume of black smoke could be seen all over Kabul.
sentences.cn: 整个喀布尔都能看到腾起的黑烟.

sentences.en: The Tianshan basalts may result from a mantle plume.
sentences.cn: 天山玄武岩可能是产生于地幔柱头.

sentences.en: This photo a plume of foam in bauxite waste.
sentences.cn: 这张图片中羽毛状的泡沫是在铝土废料中形成的.

words.tran_cn: 有羽毛的；羽毛状的；用羽毛装饰的
有羽毛的；用羽毛装饰的；羽毛似的
用羽毛装饰；华丽地打扮（plume的过去式和过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: n. 借得的漂亮衣服装门面；靠别人得来的声望

trans.tran_en: a large feather or bunch of feathers, especially one that is used as a decoration on a hat
